title: Need level 7 to post in other boards
body: what im already level 50 why can't i post in other boards saying i need level 7 but can post in this one for some reason

replies.body: Looks like posting here pushed through a sync since you're showing up as level 50 for me now!

Posting for the first time, or using the [syncing tool](https://boards.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/help-support/fos1aFEB-boards-profile-syncing-tool), will update your forum level with your in game level. Your level was synced, and you should be able to post elsewhere now! ^_^
